Class Matrix

extends java.lang.Object
    This is an Object which represents a matrix.

                int y,

        y - The vertical index of the element.

      • getRowVector

        public Vector getRowVector(int y)

        Returns:
        The Vector formed.

      • getColumnVector

        public Vector getColumnVector(int x)
        Gets the Vector that is formed by a row of this Matrix with the horizontal index of x.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The Vector formed.

      • scale

        public void scale(double scalar)
        Multiplies all the elements of this Matrix by a value.
        Parameters:
        scalar - The value which will multiply every element in the Matrix.

      • transpose

        public Matrix transpose()
        Returns:
        This Matrix but the Row Vectors are now Column Vectors and vice versa.

      • randomize

        public void randomize()
        Sets all the elements in the Matrix to random values between 0 and 1.

        public double sumElements()
        Returns:
        The sum of all elements in the Matrix.
